string-array.name: developers
string-array.item: This game centers on building and upgrading a village while defending against enemy attacks. Players join clans, train armies, and strategize in epic battles to claim victory over other clans.
A real-time strategy game where players collect and upgrade cards to battle opponents worldwide. With tactics and quick decisions, players aim to outmaneuver each other and climb the ranks.

Known for its blocky universe, Minecraft allows players to explore, build, and survive in a vast world. Whether in creative or survival mode, players can mine resources, craft items, and encounter unique adventures.
A rhythm-based platformer that combines music with challenging obstacle courses. With precise jumps and perfect timing, players aim to complete levels while enjoying a catchy soundtrack.
This endless runner game follows a character dodging trains and obstacles in vibrant subway scenes. Collecting coins and power-ups along the way, players strive to reach new distances.
Featuring a high-tech jetpack, players navigate through a lab filled with hazards like lasers and missiles. With coins to collect and missions to complete, each run offers excitement and challenges.

An augmented reality game where players encounter Pokémon in real-world locations. By exploring, catching Pokémon, and battling others, players experience the thrill of becoming a Pokémon trainer in their surroundings.

Set on a spaceship, crewmates complete tasks while identifying an impostor in their midst. Deception and deduction play key roles as players work to achieve victory, either as crewmates or as the impostor.
In this battle royale game, up to 100 players fight to be the last one standing on a vast island. With a variety of weapons and gear, strategic survival and skillful gameplay are crucial to victory.

A simple yet addictive game where players guide a character across roads, rivers, and other obstacles. The game challenges timing and reflexes, offering an endless adventure with a classic arcade feel.
In this fast-paced adventure, players race through an ancient temple while avoiding traps and obstacles. It’s a test of reflexes and speed as they try to escape the temple’s dangers.
An ever-expanding universe where players can explore and play a variety of user-created games or design their own. Roblox encourages creativity and community interaction in a wide range of genres.
A guessing game where Akinator uses a series of questions to identify a character the player is thinking of. Known for its surprising accuracy, it’s a fun and engaging experience for all ages.

string-array.name: releasedates
string-array.item: Developed by Lightspeed & Quantum Studios in 2018
